EnhancedContent: For some reason, my computer hasn't been shutting down automatically after system updates over the past two months. I selected the update and shut down, but it didn't shut down automatically after the update. Is this a bug in the feature, or is it a problem with my computer?
Author: AAbner
Title: Can the update and shutdown function be used normally?
Description: For some reason, my computer hasn't been shutting down automatically after system updates over the past two months. I selected the update and shut down, but it didn't shut down automatically after the update. Is this a bug in the feature, or is it a problem with my computer?
